author: Tom Jackman, Rachel Weiner
title: D.C. Proud Boy accused of menacing Chuck Schumer on Jan. 6 sentenced to 55 months - The Washington Post
description: Joshua Pruitt, who joined the far-right group during earlier violent protests in Washington, was described by police as an instigator of the riot.
content:
